lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome, and hello everyone to the next episode of Critical Role. A silly show where a bunch of us voice actors get together and play Dungeons and Dragons on Geek and Sundry's twitch stream. So for returning fans, welcome, and to all the new folks tuning in finally, welcome to you as well. So before we get into the meat, a few announcements and such, let's roll that intro.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Silly? [dramatic music]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back. So, a couple things I want to get off the bat to you guys. Our subscription giveaways this evening. For every hundred subscribers, we are giving away special care packages with D&D books signed by the Critical Role crew, as well as a signed photo, comics, other goodies. So the next one will be at 5,300, we will do another giveaway. Remember, you have to be in the chat room to be able to acquire one of these packages. So tune in to get something. Keep that in mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, this week we have playing: we have Grog. We have Vex'ahlia. We have Percy. We have the shortly arriving here Scanlan, who has been fighting L.A. traffic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's here! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quite literally shortly arriving, Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like Superman, that was amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And eventually to join the party as they slowly make their way there-- mysterious head kiss. This is the best Thursday ever. We have joining us eventually at some point we have the very wonderful and talented Mary Elizabeth McGlynn. A fantastic, talented voice actress and director and amazing person.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hello, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So look her stuff up online. She is also a great musician, singer, and this is her first time playing Dungeons and Dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Newbie!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Newbie!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'm super excited.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to kill you.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I like to refer to myself as Duchess, Grand Duchess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grand Duchess, also viable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Golf claps.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Golf claps, very appropriate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) So yeah, thank you so much for joining.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I'm so excited to be here. I'm a huge fan of the show, so I spend my Thursdays watching you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who is your favorite character on the show?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say Trinket, say Trinket

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Not the one with the scatological problem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That keeps giving and giving and...

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: The one who likes to talk to poo.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well that's a lot of us, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we get into the nitty gritty, do we have any announcements we want to make? Anything in particular coming up? I believe, Laura, you're bolting at the end of the game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm leaving probably during the game, to catch my flight to go to GenCon for the Titansgrave panel. Tomorrow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! Which for the record, I want to point out guys, this is how much Laura loves you. She was going to miss today's game but then bit the bullet, changed her flight, just so she could be here to play with everyone.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Golf claps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, after I saw my glorious Trinket yesterday, there was no choice really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else anyone wants to announce? Anything coming up?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm off to San Antonio tomorrow morning, very early, for San Japan. With Steve Blum. So come on out and have some fun in San Antonio.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heck yeah. It's a great convention, I went there last year. They're really, really good, so all you folks out there.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We were both there last year.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, we were.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go check out Mary in San Antonio. You guys should go. Also, we've had a lot of questions through twitter, from a lot of the fans, and I like the idea of transparency, and mentioning how first off, no game or game master is infallible and rules do shift and change and there have been a couple of minor alterations to the rules. Which, you know, you house rule things in a game and you test it out and balance can shift. For those who have looked at the gunslinger martial archetype that Percy plays with, I have made a few adjustments to it, balancing out a few elements there. DCs for different shots and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Definitely some foam darts that I'm shooting now. That's all I'm saying. I'm saying there is a lot of pump action and then a foam dart comes out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a suction thing at the end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is still a bonus over the actual rules which allow you to only cast one spell per round and a cantrip. We made it so that you can cast, with quickened spell, any spell and then a 2nd-level spell maximum in the same round. Slight variation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't understand anything you just said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Made no sense to me.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Two spells at once? Two spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. It's for the sorcerer, you don't have to worry about it. Minor house rule adjustments, so all you guys out there who GM and DM don't be afraid to adjust balance as you go, as long as you talk to the players about it. Anyway, that's it and that's all on my end. Shall we go ahead and begin?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (loud maniacal laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Calm down, Phillip.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, but I'm not Phillip right now, he lost. I'm a winner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Phillip doesn't exist anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cries)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Phillip's legacy is 1,000 gold to repay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Phillip is training to an 80s training montage right now. In a beef locker somewhere.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Because everyone needs a montage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The party has found themselves in the city of Vasselheim; a very deity and religion based city, in a very harsh environment. It's far up north in this continent and the weather itself is very cold, the landscape is very harsh and rugged, and outside of the city itself, there is an extremely dark, oppressive, almost unnaturally fast-growing forest known as the Vesper Timberland. This is where you encountered the hydra, last time. You just barely trekked out of the the city and found that creature. Who knows what else lies out there, but the city seems very well prepared to defend itself against whatever atrocities make their way towards the outskirts of the city. So, after Grog fought very gloriously in the Crucible and just barely lost due to a test of strength that just didn't fall in his favor, he sulked via ale and ladies back at the tavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find yourselves awakening within your respective tavern rooms, the members of Vox Machina. What preparation would you like to embark in this morning for whatever mysterious trek awaits you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do they have a weapons closet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the tavern room?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, I thought we were in the guildhall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet. You can go there if you want to, but if there is anything you want to do before arriving at the guildhall, that's up to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want anything from the tavern before we leave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What difference does it make? I want to take a shot with my brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as you and Vax'ildan get together at the bar, you have the strongest form of nasty Vasselheim liquor that they could possibly muster. It looks somewhat murky, it has elements of blue and gray to it. The barkeep assured you that this is-- "This is what you're "looking for to wake up in the morning, trust me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it taste like NyQuil?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you down the shot, it's-- not knowing what NyQuil tastes like because there is no such thing as NyQuil in this world.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ye olde NyQuil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flavor would be reminiscent of licking a wagon wheel that has seen at least 100 miles of travel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tastes like your feet smell, brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh well, that is rather uncouth, dear sister"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And not having Liam here, I'll just-- like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get rid of it. Put it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you finish your shots, you say adieu to each other and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See you on the other side

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed, stay safe."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bye Vax! (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bye Grog." And he gives you a silent finger as he leaves the tavern, in true Vax fashion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He always mixes those fingers up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any preparation on your guys' end?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to load up my-- whatever this thing is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your Ioun Stone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to load that up with an Invisibility spell. Is that a thing I could do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can put up to three spell levels into that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's two in there, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have an extra Invisibility spell in your Ioun Stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I can store three spells in there, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three spell levels.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three spell level-- So only one spell at a time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or you can do three 1st-level spells.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Then never mind. I thought it was three different spells. I've already got an extra Lightning Bolt in there. I won't add to it, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then yeah, that is a full Ioun Stone. That thing is pulsing with energy and going, "I'm good."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm good, didn't understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough. Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Other than just tinkering on a few plans that I have rolling around. I don't really have the equipment to build anything particularly interesting before we head out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog might have something in the bag of holding that you could use.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah! I've got lots of shit. We have a salt lick rock, we've got three firewood bundles, dried food rations...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many fancy cloaks left?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's... two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we've got that leather from that weird bat creature from the Underdark.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm sure it doesn't smell bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there any metal canisters in there, of any kind?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I've got my hooded lantern, but you can't have that. It's dark in places.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I don't want that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet Tiberius has metal canisters, he's got so many canisters.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two pieces of armor. Just armor

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may take a piece of armor and see if I can put together some sort of frag grenade thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just want to make a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just make a canister, put some black powder in there, put the thing together. It doesn't even have a fuse, it's something I can toss and shoot to trigger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting. I will say, due to time constraints, you would probably have to skip a decent breakfast to do this. So, be aware you may be hungry later on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got food.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Done

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got dried food rations in the bag.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll have a granola bar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll good, you're starting us off. Roll good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to inspire him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to inspire me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to inspire him with a little, (sings) Boom, clap, the sound of your gun, the beat goes on and on and on and on. Boom, clap-- That's all I got

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can take your d10 bardic inspiration, as his song blares into your left ear as you search the town for a decent location to possibly construct this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total of 19?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Total of 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Asking around and speaking to a few folks around Vasselheim, you eventually find a few folks that point you toward this long abandoned workshop that's been burned down, and it hasn't really been touched. As you go to it, you have to push some of the burned wood out of the way, but there is indeed a currently functional, if for a long time unused, forge and anvil available. In poor condition, but functional. Given about two, two and a half hours, you might be pushing your arrival time at the guildhall, but you could probably do it. Do you want to go ahead and give it a shot?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to give it a shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Do you want to use another one of your bardic inspirations on this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use it up to-- I think it's like five or six times.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stingy motherfucker!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At this point I'm probably drunk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all right, save it for later. We're going to need it for later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it takes you a while to rummage through the ground to get everything set up. You have the tools from your tinker's kit that you usually keep with you anyway, and you begin hammering away at the metal, preparing yourself a nice little spherical container. Using your black powder, which you're starting to get a little low on black powder between your bullets you've been constructing and other stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got to get home, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So something you can either, some point in the future try to scavenge up the materials for or make yourself. But just letting you know, you're starting to run a little low. So go ahead and make a-- I'm going to say make a tinkering check with your proficiency bonus of four and we will say with your dexterity. Since this is very meticulous, to make sure this doesn't detonate during construction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, you could really use some inspiration right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I don't. That is a 29.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stingy works.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like two-nine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like two-nine. Not two nines, but two-nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, in spite of the terrible materials at your disposal-- As far as the forge itself, you barely get it lit, but you can manage to heat it at enough, at least, to ply a soft metal. There is an aluminum base type that you construct as the container, and then coat that with chunks of very, very hard steel that you think will work as shrapnel. You manage to complete it. You're not sure how effective it will be, but at least you know it will travel safe, and that is really more important than anything else with these type of makeshift explosives.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Approaching the front steps again, the wooden engraving on the front doors, you step into the main foyer area and are greeted again by Mertin, the gruff looking halfling, who is in the process of thumbing through some books. He has some dried fruit on the side of his chin. He's a little groggy, like he didn't sleep well the night before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's a little what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a little groggy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lucky chap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks up as you guys approach. "Very nice you all could finally make it, it appears you are "only a grand total of 25 minutes late."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's not too much of a problem."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's a minute?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's... All right, there is not too much going on at the moment. I will not mention this to "the wife. I mean the Huntmaster. Don't mention to her that I referred to her as my wife."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kord's strength to you, sir, you've got a little bit right here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate the heads up."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a problem, not a problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me retrieve her." And you see Mertin walks off to one of the back rooms, opens the door and whispers out, "Hey "quick, your team is here." Opens the door, and walking out-- if you want to describe yourself.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I walk out in a black cloak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is exciting.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Saying, I don't know you, I don't know you-- as my tail whips back and forth. I don't know you-- almost hitting you with my horns. You, I know. I saw you at the Crucible, didn't I?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well done against the Hammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, I often get confused with Phillip the Terrible.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, I'll bet you do. You don't look that terrible to me, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog begins to blush, a large blue color on his cheeks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's your name, woman?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Zahra.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Zahra. Zahra Hydris.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And what's yours?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'm known by different names in different places.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ain't that the truth.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mostly we just call him Scanlan.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'll keep the good time in mind. And you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Percival Fredrickstein Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can call him Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They just call me Percy.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I see you have many weapons on you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I dabble

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You dabble a bit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do dabble.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes. Any forging?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, actually. I just picked it up recently. I've been working on things. I pull out the holy hand grenade.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Ah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Getting better.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I saw one of those in Antioch once

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's something new.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We'll have to compare notes sometime.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Absolutely, charmed.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'd love to see your technique.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is something mildly off-putting by her intense red skin, her relatively pointed incisors and the very prominent tiefling demonic blood in her body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're a tiefling?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nevertheless, there is an elegance to the way she walks, and there is this look of silent judgment as she continuously passes her eyes over the rest of the group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you want to know my name?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes I would. Now I'm not so sure, but please. Humor me

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vex'ahlia. It's a pleasure

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: The pleasure is all mine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh that's an icy hand grip, isn't it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love being out here without my brother. I just love it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You have a brother?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh. How fascinating.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am Grog, the unintimidated.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's nice to know your true name Phillip-- I mean Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispered) I think she knows.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to run a quick perception test.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you trying to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to figure out if she's titled. She certainly strikes me as titled. I think she has blood. She may not have blue blood but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) She's got blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be more of an insight check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Insight check, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) She's a tiefling!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can tell. From her posture, the way she walks, there is definitely a, for lack of a better term, a non-arrogant self importance to how she holds herself. But there is something about it that... there is a mild hint of insecurity there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Interesting. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I ask you what your weapon of choice is?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That would be my staff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right, yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It took many years to forge it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You made it yourself?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn, that's impressive.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is very unusual. Let me see who is supposed to be leading your group. Hold on just a moment." And he gets up and exits the room briefly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leading?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He comes back after about two minutes with a small handbook and reads through. "Yes, well, it is "customary that as a part of these trials, there is a member of the Slayers Take is to accompany you "on this journey to make sure that you--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I volunteer to be leader of the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is not up for discussion. I am sorry, small man." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I magically make a cup appear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks slightly impressed, but only slightly. By the way, being called 'small man' by a halfling is a feat within itself. "All right, so, the assigned leader to be your guide slayer for "this venture... Oh... really. Well, this should be curious indeed. She's late, it seems." At which point, the door opens to the guild hall and in comes stumbling a human female.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, that is disappointing. That is just disappointing. Oh my gosh, you are so impressive, how lovely. Mertin, I brought you some papaya. I'm sorry. It's all over the floor right now. I-- you know what, I will go get a broom, I'll clean it up right now--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no, don't worry about it, I insist--"

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Somebody might slip--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Stay. With your group. We have important business to discuss. I appreciate the papaya."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (under his breath) She's the leader?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: So nice to meet all of you. You are large. You are not. You are so pretty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you are too.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, I've heard about her, she is something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She is... yeah.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Anyway. Nice to meet you, nice to meet you.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Hi, I'm Lyra.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Lyra? Lyra.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Yes, very nice to meet you all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you can see from her-- she is dressed in a nice blouse, her just-past-shoulder-length, somewhat curly hair, is kept as much as a frazzled woman would keep. A large pair of glasses adorn the front of her face, and she definitely is not who you were expecting to be considered leading this group into its journey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What sort of fighter are you, Lyra?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, this is so exciting. This is-- I'm getting out Mertin, they are letting me out! This is so exciting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is probably a technicality. I'll have to make sure this was maybe not--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please, yes.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, no, I don't think so.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do you find yourself sitting behind a wooden structure most of the day? Something flat like this? Like a desk or a table?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh my gosh! Do you have psy abilities?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Just intuition, I guess.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, no. This is so funny. I've seen you from afar, but I'm very busy in the back room. You know, I'm very-- I'm invaluable. Right, Mertin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She is. Useful. Yes."

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Listen, we are going to catch up so much. I'm just really excited. They are letting me out, Mertin!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you led a group like this before?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: No, it's so funny. You wouldn't be able to tell, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Not at all.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You seem very experienced.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Veteran.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very in-charge.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you. I mean, listen. I just wanted to welcome everybody. No, no. They don't actually let me out a lot and I was-- you know-- when I got the scroll in front ... it was just-- This is my best robe.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You've got a little papaya juice on the front of it

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: (gasp) Oh my god! That was inadvertent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear this awkward smack sound as Mertin has face-palmed, as unbelievably hard as he can, at the edge of his desk. "I shall retrieve the Huntmaster." Then he gets up and leaves. You guys are left alone in the foyer for a moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So Lyra, you are already a full fledged slayer?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I am, in fact.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you slain?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I am a member of the guild. Well, if you want to be technical--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You seem like someone from The Guild.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Yes, I'm a guild member. It's funny because it's kind of a technicality. I don't know how that happened, but I'm here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you normally do? Bookkeeping? Storage?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, well. It's a really long story. Can I tell you all about it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Abridged. Abridged.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog look, papaya.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rah!

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I guess some of it's still clean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He doesn't care.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's still good.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Yes, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Trinket, Trinket too. This is my bear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, do we get Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, of course we get Trinket! Scanlan Do we get Trinket on the trip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you turn, you see that the door after you pass, and the giant armored bear has made its way in and pushes past your shoulder abruptly. And immediately goes nose down and joins Grog, eating papaya off of the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, get your own papaya.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is Trinket.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Fascinating. What kind of bear is he?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A big one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A brown one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We start to wrestle. Gently. That's my papaya you-- let go!

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Does anyone have any allergies, if I take some to-go lunches?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that would be lovely actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually I think Percy is quite hungry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I actually am quite hungry. I was-- I don't know if I am quite capable of eating papaya off the floor, but if there is, I don't know, something brunchy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have some dried food rations. Would you want one of those?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It will do in a pinch.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Here is a crumbled biscuit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A crumbled biscuit sounds-- I like her already, that will do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will remember this slight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So have you slain-- have you had any battle experience at all?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Well, it's funny. I'm actually from this city, but I was in Emon, and I was studying. I'm a wizard. You know, the wizardly arts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I've heard of them yes.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Yes absolutely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I dabble with them myself.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Exactly. My uncle is actually the diplomat from Emon here, in Vasselheim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we are from Emon, as well.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: That's so funny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perhaps you've heard of us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vox Machina?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Castle Greyskull Keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Castle Greyskull. Some know us as the S.H.I.Ts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kind of a big deal.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: No. No, but I would love to hear all about it. I'll put it on a scroll. Anyway, so I came here because my boyfriend, Aldor, is here. He is going to be my boyfriend. It's a long story.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've met Aldor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where did we meet Aldor?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we met Aldor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was the leader of the team that found you guys in the forest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) That guy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We tangled with him. Our first run in with Aldor was not fortuitous.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Did he look good? Did he look healthy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, he looked kind of like a dick. If you want my personal opinion but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She means he was--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strapping!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Strapping, like a dick.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Well he is very large, and we won't talk about that area. I have seen it, but let's not talk about that either.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is your weapon of choice, Lyra?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, I have a wand. I have a wand. It's right here. See? It's not very long.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What's it made of?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, it's ash. Which-- it's lovely. It's very nice. Do you want to know more about it?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I would love to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vanessa Cyndrial steps into the room and looks about the rest. "Very nice to see that you've all gathered your teams for the day, and I am also "curious to see your first foray into leading a group of slayers yourself, Lyra."

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I'm very excited to use the commanding presence of a guild leader, and prove my membership of the guild.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would like to thank you very much, as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (muffled) Yeah, me too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For putting us in her capable hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This was a... more of a choice of convenience, and a test universally. As you are a "team of unproven fighters, in the eyes of the guildhall, and, well. We have a relatively "unproven member, as well."

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Well. I mean, I'm a member.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Technically, yes. However, I think that her knowledge and experience would be of very good use "on such a trek."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, it should prove to be quite educational, I would think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll learn a lot from hearing her talk.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Yay! Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should try the biscuits. They are slaying me. That's all I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you eat? Do you eat-- does it get stuck in your teeth a lot?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well, it does sometimes, but you grab a twig and just work it out after a while. Gives you a little something later to chew on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Twigs work great. Don't they? I like twigs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't we have some guilds to prove membership to?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, can we kill something now please, before we learn anything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She snaps her fingers loudly, and Mertin comes rushing from around the corner carrying something in his arms. "As you are on this journey for us, and for the guild, and your own personal "name and title within our establishment, we would like to provide you with a semblance of "protection, or at least a useful little package. A gift, from us to you." She puts her hand on the table and Mertin comes over and hands you what looks like a small leather chest. It's made of sculpted leather. Rolls back, and pushes it forward. You can hear the clinking of glass as he does so, and on the inside you can see there are four glass vials, prepared with some sort of a swirling red, silver-ish liquid inside. You recognize these as healing-based potions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like Moderate Healing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Superior? Perhaps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These would constitute as Greater Healing Potions, and there are four in total. You can distribute as you see fit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think the members of Vox Machina should get them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That doesn't seem really--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is that what you think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, just because I-- I defer to--

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: As the leader, I enjoy being hospitable, and I agree with this small person.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well Scanlan, if you feel you need it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I already have a couple, so I will gladly give one to somebody who is going to need it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got plenty. Take it. If you need it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I have plenty myself. Thank you very much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will. More for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Has everyone gathered the provisions they require "for this journey? Are you ready to embark?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, we don't have a body bag for some of these chumps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you eat enough, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The biscuit was very filling. It was extremely filling.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Can I just go to the kitchen and grab some-- no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is used for the transportation of, how do you say, perishable aspects of your quarry. Things "that you would harvest from the creature you have been assigned tend to, depending on the creature, "rot away within a very short period of time. When placed within this, they should be sustained for a "few weeks at the very least. So, please do be very mindful and careful of this. Should it be lost, "there is a very small chance you will be able to fulfill your contract. So, who shall be taking "this on the journey?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've already go the bag of holding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll hold onto it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I shall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're kind of stealthy aren't you?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I shall take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shall take it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I shall take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we roll for-- Why don't we flip a coin for it?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do you know Roshambo?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ha!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Congratulations, I'm so happy for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wait. Should we ask the leader of the group, here?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry Lyra.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh that's quite all right. Thank you for actually including me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: As the leader of this party, I will agree with the roshambo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (chuckles) So it is decreed.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, I'm so sorry, I didn't mean for my tail to hit you in your rear end so sharply. Sometimes it has a mind of its own.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a whip.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point Vanessa is just watching with a grin on her face. "It is good to see you have "already established a pecking order within your traveling companions. This bodes well for your "journey, most certainly. To you." And she hands you the satchel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Please.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm sorry, I don't think it was given to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I already have it. I already have it on my shoulder. It's too late. I'm writing it down.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I certainly hope you don't lose it during our quest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vanessa, I have a question. What happens if we don't come back with all of the members we left with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, then I suppose they would not be allowed into the guildhall."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mostly for no longer returning to the city of Vasselheim, but that is not our problem. There "is danger in this which I should get to, actually."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, please tell us. Where are we going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It has been approved for slaying. This will prove quite a challenge. Based on how highly you spoke "of your abilities, I will warn you. The quarry is quite dangerous. Should you find yourself in "trouble, I wish to remind you that it is better to live and fail, than to be foolish and die. Let me "pass on to you the contract that has been selected for you." Then she reaches out and hands this over to you, Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should Lyra?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh no, let me try. Oh no! Maybe you should read it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I cast Mending on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do that? So sexy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she flicks her wrist a small spark of purple-ish dark energy shoots from her finger, slams into the side of the contract, and the tear in the contract repairs itself immediately.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scotch tape would do it too.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: The Scots have nothing to do with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Ordered and paid in advance by the alchemist Oswind Grund, the client... This "contract, binding in honor of the elements, set upon the agreed members of the Slayer's Take "guildhall the task of locating and slaying the below-mentioned entity and the recovering of the "below-listed harvested anatomy items. Any anatomy items not recovered or not in functional condition "will be deducted from the final payment, and will be refunded to the client. This client--"

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm sorry, could you go over, again, what we are harvesting, please?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, we haven't gotten to that yet.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's all right. "This contract is good for three days, and should the contract not "be fulfilled within that time period, then all payments are null and void, this contract is null "and void, and the membership within the Slayer's Take is revoked, outside of the Huntmaster's "willful forgiveness."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the fine print, get to the details.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Quarry has been approved for hunting by the Holy Paramounts of the Crown of Erathis. The quarry: one adult white dragon--" One adult white dragon?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A white dragon? Would I know? I would know, because I've studied them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, having dragons being a very favored enemy for you. White dragons are one of the chromatic dragon circle. They are considered largely very spiteful, arrogant, a little more bestial, and very, very dangerous foes.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, they are glorious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't we kill a white dragon?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Platinum dragon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I thought the ice dragon thing-- wasn't she white?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once upon a time, you battled, back at Westruun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't see race so I don't know.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: What kind of element is a white dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ice and frost.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the woman and then she turned into a dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Ashley killed her. I mean, Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This bodes well. If you have already defeated such a creature, then this should be a "very simple task."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no problem.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: This is going to be easy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do we have to bring back?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They want eyes, tongue, heart, claws, and teeth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So anything else we get to keep ourselves?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two eyes, one tongue, one heart, six claws, and 20 teeth, is what they are requesting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And do we get paid for such items?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tongue is 1,200 gold. The heart is 3,500. Claws, 250 gold each, and teeth are 50 gold each.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: If there are any remaining organs, we can roshambo for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very good."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And scales, definitely. There will be plenty of scales.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plenty of scales.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, there will be plenty of scales. Very good for armor and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very good for armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it say where this dragon lives?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, see. That is part of the job. To find one's quarry is why we are so specialized, in the "Slayer's Take. You may now embark. Once we signify the pact of the contract." And as she reaches out and touches the edge of it, you can see there are these arcane sigils that are on the contract itself. They glow and pulse briefly and she just walks across the group. First, to you Percy, as you were holding it. "Place your hand against the contract." As you do they light up, and you feel a surge of warm energy go through your torso. At which point, you now see, at the bottom of the contract, your name inscribe itself, magically, into the contract. She then takes it and passes it to each one of you to the same point. As the spell binds--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Trinket? Does he use his paw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I suppose he is part of your band." And she reaches out the paper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket. Shake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slams it out of her hand, knocking the contract onto the ground, and there is a brief moment where she pulls the paw back and the paper is wrecked a little bit, but there is indeed a paw that inscribes itself on the bottom of the contract for Trinket's insignia. "Now, I have a "busy day to attend. I wish you the utmost of safety, good luck, and safe travels."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, I guess.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Bye! I'll alphabetize the rest of those ingredients when I get back. Don't worry. It's going to be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd appreciate that, good luck."

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Okay, great. Bye-bye. Thanks again for giving me a chance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's great. Please, go."

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you the housekeeper here?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: On a technicality, but I am a guild member.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Tell me again, what have you slain?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Well, well, it's--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No, very abbreviated, just a short-- can you say the word of what it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the biggest one.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: And at the last minute I interceded.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You killed someone who was sleeping with your boyfriend?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: No, no. It was worg. A worg!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a thing?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It's a thing

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We haven't encountered one of those, I don't think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a person that changes into animals, am I right?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No, it's something that-- it projects itself into animals?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm a very prolific reader. And I've never read of worgs other than in that circumstance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In Twilight, that's true.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That could have been the fairy tale section of the library.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It also sparkles. Sparkles in the sunlight.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: But only in the sun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Worgs in this world are essentially a side breed of large bulbous, wolf-like entities.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: A bulbous dire wolf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh you killed a wolf?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: A bloated wolf, basically?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It's a large wolf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not quite dire wolf sized.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, yeah, that's great.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: A gaseous wolf?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For instance-- out of character here, outside of the world. In Lord of the Rings, the things that the orcs ride.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, they're really scary.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It was quite a situation. It was either the worg or Aldor, and I would do anything to save Aldor. What did he look like, when you saw him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god, here we go again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was a little dirty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, he looked actually kind of frightened.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Was he wearing armor? Like, a red-ish sort of very fantastic armor?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was hard to focus on his armor with all of his screaming and panting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And whimpering, really.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: He is very brave. He must have been injured.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, yes, he seems like he would have been had he hadn't--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We tease because we love. He did fine. He fought well. He fought bravely, and he treated us fairly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Especially when he got burned by Tiberius.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: You burned my.... kind-of-boyfriend?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not the face. Not the face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His face is fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't do it.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: We need to talk about this more on the road, but we should get going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's certainly start talking.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, let's do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With no particular direction in where to find the white dragon in three days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three days?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three days to slay it, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Vex. Can any of us sense a dragon within six miles of here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I'm doing. I'm checking that out.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, yes. I can cast Locate Creature too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that works too.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Yeah, let's do it. Together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we need some sort of-- anything for you to cast the spell?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh no, I have all of my ingredients.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but do you need to know something of what you are trying to locate? Or does it work on name alone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As per the Locate Creature spell, it can only locate creatures within 1,000 feet of the ritual that is completed. But it locates them with pinpoint accuracy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's great. Well then we can use it in conjunction. Because I can use Primeval Awareness and find any dragons within six miles.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh you are very skilled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try to grow my beard, real quick?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You can grow a beard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sometimes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's better, that's better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, and you guys noticed it and didn't make a mention, because for some of you this was just a very dire morning. But since Grog woke up this morning he had a very, very nice coat of somewhat bristly, translucent-- not very attractive facial hair, but facial hair by definition.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like fishing line coming out of his face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a damn pirate now. Watch out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like a 14 year old whose father doesn't love him enough to teach him how to groom himself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Jesus... Oh. Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's dark.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a story there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy's seen some shit.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: None.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, can I do that then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. You, along with Trinket by your side, you find a small space--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't find his exact location, but I can...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can gather the general--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How far away are we, from the wood, at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are still in the city of Vasselheim. You are in the Quadroads district, which is the most central portion of the city-- it's the Erathis driven area. You are about a 15 minute walk from the nearest walls that exit out into the Vesper Timberlands.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Do I know anything about where the dragon might be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea. This would be one of those occasions where your best bet would be research or asking around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dragon! Drag--!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, don't do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So can I--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you take a moment, you ground yourself, and you place your hands on the dirt and take in the general feel of all natural creatures and unnatural beasts that you are attuned to in the vicinity. You focus on the essence of what is dragon and dragonkin, dragon kind. And find that within the six mile radius, there is nothing that catches your attention.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Lyra. Lira? Lyra.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Lyra. Thank you for asking because some people just don't care.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, well I want to get it right. Who-- you've been living here for quite some time, I imagine, as a guild member.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Well, I grew up here, with my uncle-- Uncle Randy. Do you want to meet him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was going to ask you where should we go to ask who might know things about the woods, about the wilds, about where dragons might keep?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: That's a very good question. I would say Aldor, but he will not talk to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's unfortunate.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It is, really. Do you want to talk about it, because I could use some advice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can have some girl talk later, but right now, focus on the dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Zahra, what about you, do you know about dragons?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Maybe get an idea, or--

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: There may be somebody at the Abundant Terrace who might know something about the woods and direction. That might be a good place to start. It's a section of town where they concentrate on-- yes. So we can go there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, let's do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go there. Please, god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you approach this small hill that leads into the terrace proper, it is almost entirely farmland. In this strange, harsh environment there is something about this entire district that is structured to be the source of vegetation and crops, and to be essentially feeding a large portion of the population here. You also see there are a series of small temple towers and statues that are focused around a particular deity. I want you guys to go ahead and roll religion real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll a d20, and add your religion.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Starting off well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great first roll.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: That roll is not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Melora which is considered the goddess of wilderness and the sea and is one of the five-- soon to be six if Pike's temple raises-- deities that essentially rule the belief system and lifestyle of the city of Vasselheim. So through the blessing and touch of Melora in this district they are able to treat the land as magically fertile territory to grow. You gather upon stepping inside that there's a cluster of dirty looking, but very, very cluttered and busy taverns, inns and general stores, like the entire portion of the district that isn't farmland is jammed into this one little corner. Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, all right. You guys split up a bit briefly to try and find more information. One of the groups that coalesces is Vex, Scanlan, and Lyra. The three of you come upon a place called The Midnight Breath Tavern. You step inside and speak for a bit and eventually you meet the co-owner, a gentleman named Dagon, who is an older human who has what looks like a reddish, but somewhat patchy red and brown beard, a couple scars on his body, but nothing battle worn-- more just a person who has existed in this harsh landscape for a while. You guys are asking around and talking about dragons, mentioning dragons, and somebody points in his direction and says, "Ah, "dragon. You're gonna want to talk to Dagon about that. He's the one who sees dragons."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sees them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: That's nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk over to Dagon--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not with us, are you?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not with us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're with me. We're still wandering about like idiots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are wandering about.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Are we outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are in the process of asking around. You'll meet up with them in just a moment.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Vex, you're very attractive. Use your wiles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Her wiles kill.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dagon, is that your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's my name." He's cleaning a glass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've heard many things about your knowledge of dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Correct."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Y--You've seen it? You've seen the dragon?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have seen dragons, and they suck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a couple of snickers down the bar and he goes, "Shut the hell up!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless you like them. Do you like them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no one around here likes a dragon proper. At least, none that I've come across. No, "I swears it. I swears it. I saw this one. I was up north, about two days' travel northwest of here via "the Glasswalk Road. That's two days' travel horseback, mind you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Glasswalk...? The Glasswalk... Road?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Glasswalk Road, yeah."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our fire began to go out, "and we were a little worried."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then there was a dragon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, get to the dragon. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hold on, let me tell my story."

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: That was very rude. I am so sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's all right, I'm used to it." And a voice over there says, "Yeah, he is!" "You. I will kick you out. I will kick you--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I believe that you saw a dragon and I believe that it was white because you were in a blizzard. Right? Am I right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So partway into the night, we're trying to keep warm when suddenly we hear this terrifying roar, "that streaks across the sky. We could hear it over the blistering sound of the snow and sleet "battered against our tent. I rush outside to take a look. Not sure what to find, but instead, I see "what looks like a pack of four dire wolves converging on our camp. Large, nasty beasts--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very much like a worg, if you will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Worg-like, a little larger, yes."

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: How large? Do you want to tell-- How large proportionally would you say the...? No? Okay, keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, no. I mean, if you want to get into-- if you're talking worg versus dire wolf, worg is "still pretty large. About a good three, four--"

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I know, I've seen one. You know what happened with me? I got into the guild because...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god, here we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well. Actually. Dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I reach over and draw my dagger, and prepare "myself to defend--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a giant dagger, if I've ever seen one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wing-span huge, claws and teeth gnashing--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would never have guessed that's where that was going. White dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The worg itself freezes in mid-air."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Before it can plummet, the creature then closes its jaws, snatching down on that worg, and "biting it in two. Only one fell stroke. As the pieces of ice clatter to the ground, the rest of "the worgs scatter. I believe that dragon saved our lives that night."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great. How did you make it back, without dying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well apparently the dragon had its fill and the dire wolves went off. So we packed up and went "right on back. Never made it to Muldire."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did the dragon keep flying in the direction of the Glasswalk Road? Or did it go east or west? Or which way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea, actually. We just ran. We turned tail and got the hell out of there as fast "as we could."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was quite a story, quite a story.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: That was stirring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You believe me? You believe me on this?!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We believe you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I may write a song about your exploits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Could you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, could I roll for perception or insight to see if he's telling the truth on everything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll insight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll! Two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, two. No, 17.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, is that a 17 or an 11?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dagon does seem to be truthful in, at least, believing what he is saying to you.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Thank you so much for your information-- I take a gold coin and I'm just like, is this enough? Yes, that's good. Thank you. So we-- we'll be going. Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I perception and see how heavy that bag of gold actually looks? I just want to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to roll the gold dice. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. As she reaches into the pouch-- there is a rather large, visibly bulging pouch to her side that is, in no way shape or form, even attempting to be covertly hidden.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's got a Scrooge McDuck bag? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seemingly.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Does it make her limp? So sorry.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh goodness. Guys. We are going to have to get some warm clothing. It seems like that. So let's go shopping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love this plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh God.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dagon. Dagon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is! Dagon. Remember the name Dagon for your song."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will definitely write a song for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can write it down for you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I can remember that. Will we have any trouble finding this place? Will we need a guide? Someone who's possibly been there before? Would that make the journey--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I ain't going back! Y'all's crazy if you're going back there. I would say just look for "where the blizzard is coming from. That seemed to be the harbinger of the beast."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go to the blizzard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two days on horseback, or two days walking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two days on horseback. Up the Glasswalk."

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, we'll have to get horses, too. Well, let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does the guild give you money for..?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Um.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you know, horses are provided to full-fledged hunting members. You got the feeling, in your very, very brief preparation for this, that part of the test was to secure your own transportation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I think we are on our own. I mean, I think it's part of our perseverance to prove that we are worthy of being-- I mean I am in the guild, just to be clear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a member?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: We are just going to have to-- Yes, I am a member. Did you hear how I got in? It is really a fascinating story.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I heard it was sort of a technicality.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, well it was but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't wait to hear it.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Maybe around the campfire!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: You could sing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could, if you told me the details. You know what, I do forget a lot. Maybe you could just write them down quietly to yourself and just give me a note later.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Okay, as long as it's a love story between me and Aldor-- I'll tell you how to spell it. Okay! Well, let's go meet the rest of the group!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Dagon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we're leaving, I walk up behind Lyra and I put my hand on her shoulder, and then I reach down and grab her bag of gold and I (clears throat) and look down to it and say, you might want to keep a better eye on this, darling. There are very very nasty people around.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh my goodness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're traveling with some of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't take anything, I'm simply letting you know.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: That is so nice of you! I'm going to buy you the prettiest cloak as thanks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much, darling. You have lovely eyes.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Thank you! I've never had a friend before! This is so great!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe when we shop you can tell me all about Aldor.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, he is so handsome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys step out of the tavern, you walk up to the other members of your party: Zahra, Grog and Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, thank god.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What have you discovered?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Northwest. Cold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blizzards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dragon. Blizzard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It ices things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two days. We need horses.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Two days?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll definitely need some sort of protection against ice attacks.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question. I'm not good with numbers, but it's a two days' journey there? And a two days' journey back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do have an airship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that four, and we have three days to do this in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't we have an airship?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are we going to do that exactly?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I'm not the brightest in the bunch, but.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know that contracts are complete upon the quarry being slain.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: We have three days to get home. It's hard. You were reading it a little bit fast

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Two days to get there and one day to slay it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thereabouts, yes.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is that about it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once the creature is actually slain, and the pieces are harvested, then the contract is completed. Then you can take your time returning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank God.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Great. We can ride it down the mountain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to get some horses up in this joint?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: We need horses, we need cloaks, we need furs, wools...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We definitely need warm things. Actually, I have warm cloaks for the party and half of our party isn't here so we can have them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you need some cold weather clothes, Zahra?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I believe, it would be nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Lyra did you bring anything?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Well I can go by my uncle's house and get pretty much anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah? Oh wait! Would he have enough for us?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It's so funny.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go do that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously? Wait, so does he give discounts to family members?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh I can just, you know. I can persuade him to-- because he's nice and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lyra, I think we're going to be best friends!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Way to bury the lede!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Lyra, does he have access to horses?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Um. I don't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't ever had any sort of discussions with him in regards to horses. You know there are a few liveries throughout town, but you don't think you have any family ties to them directly.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Not directly. I mean, it's trade more than that, but I know some places.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this your Uncle Randy?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Uncle Randy! Yes, you know about him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's legend. His legend has been sung far and wide.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: He took me in when I was-- anyway we'll talk about it over fire camps!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on, everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So can we find horses in the area?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you enter, the gentleman who runs it there is eager, "Have you come to buy some horses? Well, "certainly."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rent them. Let's rent them for a week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The thing about renting is, in this area if you're riding out with horses, a lot of them don't "make their way back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about we rent them, and if they don't make their way back we'll pay you the difference?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll leave you a hefty deposit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That could possibly work, yes."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: May I cast Suggestion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, try it. Do it!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Are you all right? Am I all right to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I cast Suggestion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so while you guys are in this conversation, you stay back and make a few symbols with your fingers, whispering under your breath, you complete the Suggestion spell. What's the DC of your spell? It should be on the top of your spell page. The top of your actual sheet that has all your things listed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: DC 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What do you want to suggest?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You shall lend us the horses, knowing that we shall take very good care of them. We may keep them for as long as we like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're having this conversation he looks over at the group and goes, "You know what? You "all look like a very trustworthy group. I wouldn't wanna breed any sort of ill will for future "business."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. I mean, Uncle Randy after all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't worry about any sort of deposit. I believe you're trustworthy folk."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. Thank you, sir!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So for six horses, we're look for a rental price of around... Say, 50 gold for the lot, rental."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Done!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, well--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can save a little if I shared a horse with you.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh. Wha-- no. No, I'd rather have my own horse. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can ride with me, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But, Trinket--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shut down!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he ride-- is he as fast as a horse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) Trinket would probably be struggling to keep up with you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, how--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we leave Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I always want to leave Trinket!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do you always wanna leave my wonderful bear?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because he only almost dies every time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, he almost dies every time I put him in battle. It's ridiculous.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I think he's adorable, and it would be really nice to have him along.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is adorable, isn't he?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: You guys, it's so beautiful to see the friendship that you have. If I had that with another person-- say, Aldor-- it would be--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aldor is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh God. Do you have any Clydesdales or giant horses for me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you thought of getting a cat, by any chance?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Hm?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a suggestion. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think we could... probably facilitate. I can't say that it'll have much of a shelf life, "depending on how much you ride it, but--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what people say about me. That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls out a very, very nice looking warhorse that looks like it's designed to carry very heavy soldiers. Still unproven as to whether or not it will be able to carry you, but we shall see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And once again, the horse travel wasn't two days of straight gallop. It was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A casual trot, in which Trinket could probably keep up, but you guys might have to take a break every now and then, because he's still a bear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Well, it's doable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make him earn it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the bear-est mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got, like, five more. I've been saving them up for this entire game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I missed...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing. No-- it's nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, puns yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For every bear pun that happens, an angel loses its wings.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So do we give you our gold and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, yes. Here's our gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certainly, certainly! I'll get you your horses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, who's-- who's paying?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The party is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it-- half our party isn't here, so--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I'll just-- Don't, don't-- I'll just do it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, thank you!

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: There you go. Thank you! Bye-bye, nice to meet you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you kindly."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! You're so kind! That's excellent.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks, Lyra

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well done, Lyra. Very good.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Now, I need to talk with you. Can-- can we go out? Are we leaving yet? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And what did you want to do?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Listen, missy. I am a leader of this, and the fact that you pulled out a spell and did not say-- and it is just-- it's just not even the way I want to conduct my team. So. You. If you're going to use underhanded tactics you need to clear them with me first because I am the leader.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: My spellcasting is actually overhand, but...

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Wha--?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I understand. And I shall keep that in mind, and I do apologize.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, I apologize very deeply. Very, very sincerely.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I was just a leader! I did it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
