lines.text: Dust of-- Cloud of Deterrence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cloud of Deterrence, thank you.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Whoever you are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yes, Dust of Tracelessness. He's got this stuff, we can cover our tracks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we sleep?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: We slept already, we're on the horses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the next day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. We ride.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We ride!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And so we ride!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I take the Dust of Tracelessness and I, in the back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we ever run out of that stuff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Never.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's an infinite supply.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: That is very convenient.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it is, it's really nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully you're keeping pace with Trinket, it's having a hard time keeping a goliath on its back for extensive riding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I give it-- could I give it a health potion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's just say it's probably going to be a little sway-backed by the end of this adventure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, poor thing.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Poor little horsie.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It may need to ride you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay for now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At some point you should give it a break with the carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't ride the carpet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have the carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why did we--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have the carpet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We gave the carpet to them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The other team has the carpet? Those bastards.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I don't know them, but that's very-- that is upsetting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. That is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue traveling for a second day--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all right, we don't need the crutch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Second day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're fine.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Day two.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: And so anyway, so, when I first met Aldor--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: -- he was hired to be my bodyguard and it was so obvious that he was so capable when he walked in the room--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did he react when you first told him of your feelings?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I mean, it was not a good evening, but he was paid to be there so he couldn't leave, so that was, well, that was good for me--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Always works for me.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It's not, it didn't work today, but it could work tomorrow or the day after.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. Can we make an agreement. I kill you, you kill me?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: And suddenly he disappears, it's so funny that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you-- men are complicated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few hours of-- a few hours of travel and--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Percy, any extra guns?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys stop for a second and repackage yourself with your fur and heavy winter clothing, and even still it's very, very chilly. I'd like everybody to make a constitution save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we still in the forest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are nearing forest, yes. So yeah, you would be considered in forest area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't I good like above 20,000 feet in really, really cold environments?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you have advantage on this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20! Sorry, that was my first one.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: You're so warm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) So warm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's bad thing to roll a natural 20 on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're cuddling you for warmth, apparently. You're like an oven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Trinket, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, that adds up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this a constitution saving throw or just a modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a constitution saving throw, so you roll twice and take the higher.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, wow. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think, I'm pretty sure that's how that works. I'll check here with the goliath as the mountain-born-- oh, you're just naturally adapted to it, so you're fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) I've got my chest out, my nipples aren't even getting hard. It's amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oddly, your face is a bit cold because it's so bare.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your instinct-- that was a low blow. That was a low blow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so all of you manage-- Scanlan, mark yourself, you have one level of fatigue.

lines.name: LAURA, MARY
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that mean, what's that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fatigue, let me go ahead and make sure--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Too much listening to-- oh, sorry.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Does he look cold? I'm going to give him my stone, I'm going to give him my stone of resisting cold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was bullshit, Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about you?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It's okay. I'm a leader, and a leader sacrifices--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't let you do that, Lyra.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: No, really, just take it. You listened to me so good. It's like we're besties.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel-- I feel a connection, I do. You know when you were telling me about Aldor--

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It's not sexual at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No-- I-- uh.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I'm not attracted to you at all, like literally if it happened I would be ill, but it's really nice--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Believe me, you sexually? You repulse me.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, no, really.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh my god, I'm so with you right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: But really, as a friend you are so nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel a connection too!

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: So here's the stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have had some Aldors in my life, too.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I want to hear all about them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, mainly they were whores who kicked me out early.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But they-- in a similar way they disrespected me, didn't see the true Scanlan that I could've been.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I mean, I was-- listen. The one time we were together it was after I gave him armor, but he was not servicing me--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, together?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've been with him?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Of course, I told you--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh look, we seem to be coming to something interesting in the road.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Were you not listening?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought you meant that as a metaphor.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It was 10,000 gold--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: -- and he just, he was very attracted to me that night and we had intercourse so. My uncle was very upset with me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Intercourse.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: And after that, he never saw--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Somehow you made that less sexual than I could've ever imagined. Is there-- Grog, what's the term for when your penis is inverted? The opposite of a boner?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Belly button.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I've got now.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Anyway, I was really certain after that moment that we would be together forever and I never saw him again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know men are fickle and when I-- I'll have a talk with him.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Let's just move on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Here's the stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's not dwell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find yourself adjusting well to the cold climate, thanks to your gift from your new leader and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love her.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Leader-slash-lover?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you guys pull off the side of the road and use the cover of the forest to help from the snow that's beginning to hit even harder, you gather there is in this vicinity an ever waxing-and-waning blizzard that pours through. You can see a localized area that is not really moving. You wait like a good 20, 30 minutes to see if there's any movement but the blizzard is not shifting from its location.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Should we try to do the spell, locate dragon again, just to make sure it's at the top of this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good leading, good leading.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, I will try it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You sit and concentrate for a moment and... nothing. Nothing-- wait. You sense this very, very small blip at the edge, it's moving quickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There. There's a dragon.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Where is it, which, which--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's fast, wait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which way, east, north, south?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's getting closer, you can sense its energy up in the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's up in the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At that point you hear this distant guttural howl, just a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should hide just in case. How about we hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wind begins to pick up and the snowfall begins to become ice. The rest of you guys have to kind of duck yourself out of the way--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- everyone make a reflex, or sorry, a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I am very good at that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't even know what this is, what is this?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: MARY:12.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. All of you guys manage to find cover under the nearest tree where the bough of the forest is at its strongest. You avoid most of the brunt impact, Grog unfortunately takes a good portion of slamming ice-stone damage. Negligible for most damage you're used to, but you still take four points of bludgeoning damage from the falling ice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sleet. As you guys are currently in this position, you can see barely through the very very heavy snowfall a shape that (whoo) moves over in the distance that circles around and then heads back in a western direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we get its attention?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I cast Beast Speak and say, where do you live?! I'm kidding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was like, really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for that addendum, because we--

lines.name: LAURA, MARY
lines.text: Not really.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Not really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us are like, ahh.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I have a sick sense of humor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see which direction it's going back towards the mountain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You look over in that direction and you can barely make it through bits as the storm intensifies and begins to subside a little bit, you can see what looks to be the gentle outline of a mountain range maybe about ten miles off from the road. To the west of the road, into the forest itself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got to go in the forest.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Okay. Let's go!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It should provide us with some cover from the snow as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But who knows what lurks in those woods?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I can also, you know, see what kind of creatures are around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I can't. I can't see animals. Just kidding.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Well, we don't really have a choice, we have to get the dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's plunge in.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: And we have a time limit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're the team leader.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: We have-- we need-- now there's really no other way to go, we have to go through the forest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Currently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you guys have any other plan, right now there is about ten miles of forest between you, near the roadway, and this mountain range, where apparently the dragon has returned to.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Great, okay. Well, there's nothing else to be done, we just have to go as fast as we can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I could cast Invisibility and Fly, I could fly us all somewhere.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I don't really have any other--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you can't fly all of us, can you?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I think I can fly up to nine, I thought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can fly up to nine people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius can only fly up to three people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind of devil are you?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, should we fly? We--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, can you fly?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I can't fly, no, but maybe Zahra can fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we're flying, though, I'm just going to put this out there. There's nowhere to hide if the dragon comes back out.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I understand, but I can also cast Invisibility.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's awesome.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: But that doesn't last as long, or--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I can target one additional creature for each slot above third, what does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It means, if everything you cast is at maximum level, it would be fifth level, which means you could target three creatures with Invisibility.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Three creatures with Invisibility and three creatures with Fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But is it at the same time or is it a concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a concentration either way. I will say, as soon as you start thinking about flying and getting there, you look up past where the trees are. Flying in this weather would be a terrible idea.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: That's a terrible idea.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: You know what I was thinking, it might not be good. It might not be good. Let's just ride, we have the horses, we can't leave the horses behind. We only have--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, okay. We start riding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could, we just rented them. 50 bucks, so.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Don't remind me of that, that was just a thing. All right, onward! Let's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm still in the back doing the dust of uhhh.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Yay, go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dust of uhhh?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nay-nay.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We ride!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the flower girl picks up the back end, you guys trudge on horseback into the heart of this section of the Vesper Timberlands. It is a very dense forest and you find that any straight-road path is not going to function, as you're constantly having to weave in and out from the thick tree trunks and heavy foliage that has taken over the floor. Plus a layer of snow that tends to encapsulate the area, your movement is relatively restrained than this pace you're normally used to going. You have-- what bonuses do you have because of the forest terrain?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the group's movement, if any?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, movement is fine for all of the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully, though, you have Vex guiding you on this path and where it would be a very difficult experience pushing through this forest, especially with the time limit you have, she is able to find the quickest paths to dodge any of the heavy areas that are dense with dangerous snowfall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would also like to perception ahead and make sure that nothing is going to sneak attack us again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Understood, understood.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Very good call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. In that regard, I would like you to go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. Something out there. Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is lower than my passive perception, though. Which is 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your passive perception--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And plus five-- no, that's it, just 21. But it's a 12. For right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 12? Okay. You keep an eye out as you continue to move forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but I get to roll twice though, because it's my favored terrain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, you do. Advantage on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Shut up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When the cameraman laughs.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: When the cameraman is laughing at you, you know it's a good roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's-- no, that's not that bad-- It's 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an improvement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a slight improvement.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Better than 12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 is indeed--

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: -- better than 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The things you learn watching Critical Role, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) The more you know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Learning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So in following Vex through the forest, weaving back and forth, about an hour of travel in you-- I know you gotta get going soon. How soon do you have to go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're calling a car, and it's however soon it gets here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Pushing forward, you eventually manage to avoid what looks like a long frozen lake in the center of the forest with a series of heavily iced-over stone ruins.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't walk on this lake.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, good call, good call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move around and in the distance you swear you see the glimmer of some glowing entity in the midst of these ruins and you manage to keep enough of a distance. Everyone make a stealth check on this. So roll a d20 and add your stealth bonus.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Add it, or take away? Because it's negative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For you it'd be taking away from your stealth roll.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Great, that's great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Clang-clang-clang.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog? Stealth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stealth is 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. Though clumsy in form, the group is able to pull you far enough away where they cover your bases on this, and this glowing entity doesn't seem to take notice of your passage as it slowly fades into the stone ruins once again. You press on towards the mountain--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go check that glowing entity out?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What was it?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Do I-- oh, do I know? I have an arcana, or would it be nature, or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For this, I would say go ahead and make a religion check, actually.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, good, three. I don't know, it's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's spooky and you don't like it.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I don't like that so let's keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should avoid it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. If you insist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pushing forward about another hour and a half, two hours, you eventually make it through the forest, dodging a few other areas where clustered vines and almost thick brambles begin to close off portions of the passage. Without Vex's help on this it would be a very difficult element to traverse, but you manage to find areas you can cut through, and where the weak points of these various interwoven nets of vinework are. You push through until the forest comes to an end at the base of a giant tree-covered mountain that is currently coated in snow and ice. Looking about, you can see that the highest spire is obscured by the very blizzard clouds ahead. There is heavy snowfall in this vicinity and your vision is semi-obscured past a certain area. Only because of Vex's keen sight are you able to make out the details of that mountain disappearing into the blizzard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is very much like home for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see any-- anything along the bottom, the edge of the mountain that looks like it could open into a cavern of some sort?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number of large rocks and boulders that seem to have tumbled off the mountain and embedded themselves in the ground in sections. You do see what looks to be a cavern of some kind that is in the-- at the base of this mountain, it's about 20, 25 feet high and about 35 feet wide.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Should we maybe go in?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Does it look like we can climb the mountain, or is it just too sheer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeing one up close? They're a lot bigger than you thought they'd be.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Very large mountain, guys, I'm not sure-- as a leader I'd like to invite you guys to evaluate whether we could possibly climb this mountain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to evaluate whether or not we could climb this mountain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're delegating, that's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, delegate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I'm proficient here, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You-- I'd say for this and since you know mountain ranges pretty well, go ahead and make a wisdom check on this, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just add your wisdom modifier to the roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is zero. (laughs) 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. As you're kinda taking a moment to inspect it, you, your people, your actual race being mountain-born people, you look at it, and it could be scaled. It would be a dangerous climb and you would need some semblance of simple climbing tools to do so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we got to make it come to us.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We could.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's smart, Grog. That's really smart!

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: We have to lure the dragon down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or one of us could climb it and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jump off?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- bring it down as bait. I could do that.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I don't think that sounds like a good idea. There's a cavern over there, should we inspect it? Maybe there's some inner workings to get to the top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think this conversation would be greatly improved by some sort of cover.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll get into cover maybe just to be safe.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I agree, I vote on going to investigate the cavern.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Let's go to the cavern. Well, it's not a democracy, but that's okay, I am totally open--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And I agree with your--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear this heavy sound of wind rushing suddenly.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh god, get in the cavern, get in the cavern! Get in the cavern!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cavern now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see. Oof. Okay. (laughs) Vex. On horseback, you look over, and the snow that's hitting your face-- you see a dark shape begin to form in the snow. It gets larger and larger and larger, and you realize it's not something that's swelling or growing, it's something that's coming at you very fast and it's very large. You immediately try and turn your horse around, but it's too fast, and it slams into the side of you, sending you off the horse and tumbling to the ground. You feel a heated pain in your side you haven't felt in a long time from the impact.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah! What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch as a boulder about that big, of rock and ice--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- just smacks into the side of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're kidding me, right? That sucked.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Where did it come from?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was just a random meteor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 30 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're kidding me!

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: What the--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're knocked onto the ground.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh my god, Vex! (screams)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you, who are currently on horseback, see this, and from the direction of the forest you see a large, very large humanoid figure begin to step out of the edge of the forest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a giant? Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This low voice kind of bellows out. You can see on it thick, snow-covered fur, patchwork hide armor. The skin itself is a dull bluish-grey in color, white eyes, a giant metallic horn, what looks like some sort of creature's horns that are affixed to the sides of its helmet. A giant axe in its hand. This is indeed-- and you recognize it immediately-- this is a frost giant. You see it reach down and grab another boulder and begin to toss it in its hand. As the rest of you see this, you hear another bellow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You speak Giant, you speak Giant, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does anyone speak Giant here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a voice come echoing from the cavern behind you, saying, "Intruder! "Take him down!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, no no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we do, guys?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Talk to him, for--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A second frost giant steps out of the cavern behind you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're in between two giants and a dragon?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Without--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hagawaga... hawafenor!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm damaged.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Very damaged.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: She's damaged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, on the ground. You marked your damage, because that carries over to next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, guys, we'll-- because I know you had to leave soon and that would be a good place to stop it for this point and this week, we're going to continue this session next week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're screwed!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No we're not!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm dead!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No we're not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Starting a battle with two delightful frost giants.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we did such a good job on the last one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two giants!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Thank you so much. It was such a bloody delight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to be careful with my dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do they break?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very, very well done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got gems in here.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I hope we'll survive.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: You never know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, that was amazing. Mary and Felicia are so good.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So talented. You killed people and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brilliant.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I mended a piece of paper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did! And you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blasted the torso out of an orc.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And I killed an orc--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you made a guy like give us things for super cheap, which is like the best thing in the world.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I love a good sale, I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do too!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I love finding a bargain. We should definitely go shopping.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, I'm fine with it. I'm fine with my trust fund, because my parents are dead, yay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we have our--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We have some donations to go through, so guys, just like last week because we're getting so many donations we just don't have time to read all the messages, so we'll just read off who the donation was from and say thank you, and then I will send an exported list with all your messages in an e-mail form to all of our hosts so they can see them. But it's just so many, which is amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are ridiculous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You guys are rad.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We just don't have all night to go through them. Oh, can I make a personal request?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Can you kill Felicia next week?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not up to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's just not appropriate.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: What's that about?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's really unnecess--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: In the game, in the game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No no no no no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, in the game!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: In the game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, in the game.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Funny, like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was like, I got to think this through, man. She's right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really have to go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bye Vex!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bye Laura!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Love you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone going to GenCon--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- go say hi to her.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah, go say hi at GenCon, woo!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You know what, if you wanna like Skype in from GenCon, let me know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You got it on your phone, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do-- to what?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Us!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just for the heck of it?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Just for the hell of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I'll be on a panel!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: The whole time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The entire time, it's a really long panel.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: One long panel, it's unusual.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: That's crazy. Good luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be terrifying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Panel-con.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, bye!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bye, Laura!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bye, dear!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So it looks like we start right around here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here, awesome. Gdi35 donated $50 to 826.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much, that's incredible. Let me see.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I dunno where--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much. KleetaZX, xicxic, XCXC, I'm sorry if I butchered that, but it's spelt to be butchered so I'm doing my best I can.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You're doing great, Matt, you're doing great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Donated $50. Thank you so much. We have Markinthepark donated $50 as well, thank you.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Woo, Markinthepark!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome. Kurtcole donated $100, that's fantastic, Pippin42890 donated $250.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards the charity, thank you so much.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And this is their first time watching live.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So welcome. Fantastic, we have Jeannie2343 donated $50, thank you so much Jean, or Jeannie, however it's said. Norkalad donated $100, also their first livestream, thank you and welcome!

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Yay, first livestream!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we have SirBugglez donated $25, which is awesome. Foxyforsythe donated $23.89.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Buggles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, I like that specific cent-number, makes me happy. LastCalled2013 donated $50 towards 826, AstrocistofVaruul donated $25, incredible, incredible. Immune0 donated $25, thank you Immune0, that's fantastic. TheDuggenator8. Yeah Duggenator.

lines.name: FELICIA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah Duggenator!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Donated $25. Gaiaca donated $25, thank you Gaiaca. Mylastnameisapalindr--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Palindrome, I'm guessing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Donated $25, thank you, and awesome that's your last name. Magikthefireborn donated $20, thank you very much Magik, that's fantastic. Joerker, Joeker396 donated $111.11.

lines.name: MARY, FELICIA
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: One one one one one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like the ones.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Many ones.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: While Ryan's getting you guys' gifts ready, I wanted to do a really quick announcement for tomorrow's show. Tomorrow we are having a new show pilot kind of idea premiere, with Hector doing HeroClix with Alison Haislip tomorrow, it's gonna be a lot of fun.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: ZAC

lines.name: MARY

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We have one of our fan favorites, Robot Teammate, coming in to do musical improv tomorrow night as, and then Gather Your Party with everyone else, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (hoarsely) Disadvantage.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Tune in tomorrow night, guys. All right, I think Ryan's got some gifts for you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, continue Critmas. Once again, I'm gonna reiterate it. The outpouring of this fantastic community, what you guys do for each other, the support you guys have in playing together and supporting each other is incredible and I-- every week we're perpetually blown away and feeling unworthy for all the gifts you send, and it's amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get out of my seat!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it is appreciated, you helped decorate both the set and our living spaces now with all these amazing gifts, so we can see and be reminded of you guys all the time. So thank you again, so much, for all your incredible gifts. I love-- I can't get over Grog's cask of ale that's just.

lines.text: That Grog ale is amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is my favorite thing. It's my little baby.

lines.text: I know.

lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So sweet.

lines.text: Zac.

lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.text: --progressively pumping out amazing episodic fanfiction of Vox Machina, and sending us all of it, the stories are really really awesome. If you are inclined to, I recommend if you haven't already put them online, then share them with the rest of the Critter community, they're really awesome.

lines.text: There's a place called wattpad.com where you-- a lot of people do post fanfic.

lines.text: "I know you might not answer back due to busy schedules, but thank you guys for putting on the "show and entertaining us Critters. Sincerely, Drey." Thank you, Drey. A lot of these minis come from-- if you can't find it at comic stores nearby there's good websites like Miniature, I think it's Miniature Market. There is--Troll and Toad is one of my mainstays, Troll and Toad has a good selection of minis you can order. eBay is also a good source.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hero Forge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hero Forge, you can customize your own character minis, which is really great, and have them 3D printed out for you. And then, there is.... You can order on Amazon some of the packs of D&D figures. You don't know what's in there, it's one of those kinda you know surprise figure boxes, which is kinda fun in itself. I've bought way too many of those. But you can find those on Amazon, usually. Just look for Dungeons and Dragons miniature boxes and Pathfinder boxes as well, they have a whole slew of that, so. Those would be your best bets.

lines.text: I want to take a moment to say, I appreciate that most of our letters we get are hand-written, and that is such a rarity these days and it kinda makes this little archaic happiness in my heart sprout. So, "Matt, so far from my experience, DMs typically have a ton of dice, so I thought why not "make a little bug to help with the struggle." Bag! Bag to help with the struggle. Oh. Read that 'bug'. I'm also bad at writing hand, reading handwriting. I love handwritten letters, I'm just terrible at them, I apologize.

lines.text: The dice pool we've slowly gathered over this time. So, not to worry.

lines.text: Oh, Gamechanger!

lines.text: "Dear Critical Role and Geek and Sundry team, huge thanks to all of you for having us on "your show, promoting our charity and supporting the DX15 campaign." Which is the Deus Ex campaign we were doing. "Your support truly made a difference in the campaign and Taylor and Jim had "an awesome time in your studio. So cool!!!" Three exclamation points. "We would love to work "together in the future and hope that someday all of you or some of you can join us at the hospital "and deliver gifts and joy and inspiration to the young patients and show your gaming-- show how "gaming plays such a critical role in their treatment." I accept that challenge, I will do that. "Much love, from Gamechanger, Jake Hearst and Jim Carroll." Flipside-- Oh, Zac, pay attention. "We bought Final Fantasy Type 0 for a giveaway during the Deus Ex thing, but never got a "chance to promote it. So we would like to offer it to you and the team members could give it away to "your audience any way you'd like." Zac. "So no strings, just a thank-you gesture, token of "appreciation, and love to all the Critters out there."

lines.text: That is amazing. Thank you, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Gamechanger! And we have some fun stickers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys again so much for supporting Gamechanger and our charities and our show and everything you guys do, it's truly-- I've never been progressively and continuously moved by a community like this, and you guys make this so special, so thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a happy little spot on the sea of the insanity that is the internet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: So thank you for that, all your work.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Thanks for being so supportive for those of us-- I mean, we had so much support coming in this week from all the Critters, so thank you very much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, you guys, get ready for the fanart.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If Felicia's in that, it's gonna be fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's coming, it's coming, I'm so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Aldor.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARY

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.text: Thank you! I had some amazing help and support from you guys.

lines.text: Your like Jedi mind trick there at the beginning, I was like, oh!

lines.text: Could somebody draw a picture of Scanlan and Lyra talking about the birds and the bees? That's a request I have. Please.

lines.text: The rest of us sorting through Percy's guns.

lines.text: Click, no. Click, no. Click, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius back, sitting in the background with Bad News. He's not even in the group, but he still can't take it. Thank you guys so much, again, and I'm excited. I had Greg Tito from Wizards of the Coast, Dungeons and Dragons, send a care package, which we'll distribute once we've got the whole group together again. With a bunch of fun little gifts for the Critters that we want to give away in the future, some gifts for you guys in the group, and a bunch of really really cool minis that I get to try and kill you guys with in the future, so thank you very much, Greg Tito.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Greg!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And everyone at D&D for sending us that care package, you have officially helped facilitate a TPK at some point in the near future.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, we love you, Wizards of the Coast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Obviously. My little DM bag. I love it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Joe, a.k.a. jpcguy89, thank you for the dice as well. I found his thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much, buddy.

lines.text: Oh, it's his birthday! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Happy birthday, Joe!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Happy birthday to you!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Happy birthday!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Fancy secret agent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shut up, Nightcrawler. Well guys, thank you so much again, I think we're pretty much good for the evening, so we'll see you guys next week Thursday.

lines.text: Yeah, you guys are fucked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They'll be here as well.
